resources.string:
Born in 1995. Born in Izu Oshima, a remote island in Tokyo. My technology stack is Kotlin, Android, Rails, and React.

After graduating from Tokyo National College of Technology with a degree in Information Engineering, he joined TOKIUM Inc. in April 2016 as a new graduate, gaining 6.5 years of experience as a playing manager in the Android and web fields, and from January 2023, I will be fully committed to hiring engineers and building organizations as a DevHR.

I love Kotlin and Idolmaster. As I spent more and more time as an iM@S Producer, my real job started to resemble a producer's job.My brain was destroyed by the "Ijigen Fes" at the end of 2023, and I have recently started working on Love Live! and is now branching out into Love Live!

※UNMAINTAINED

This is a wrapper framework for Kotlin/JS for Material-UI, a UI framework for React. 

More than 100 types of UI components and functions for theme customization provided by Material-UI could be used instantly on Kotlin/JS.
I talked "Get a Cool Unit Test Environment with Spek2+MockK+JaCoCo!" at DroidKaigi 2019.
I talked "I want to develop the frontend of a web application by Kotlin! -The trail of web pages made with Kotlin/JS-" at Kotlin Fest 2019.
I talked "I want to develop the frontend of a web application by Jetpack Compose! -Does Compose for Web dream of modern web applications?-" at Kotlin Fest 2022.

This application provides various functions for the image colors of characters in THE iDOLM@STER. Currently, two functions, "Search" and "Penlight", are implemented. \n\nThis Application is developed by Kotlin Multiplatform.
※Under Development\n\nThis application is a multi-platform client of Mastodon.
